posts.post_content:
Subpar card in duels, absolutely devasting and hilarous in multplayer, especially if there are multiple players running multiple copies. In my group this was hitting 20 damage for 5 mana. And at instant speed. Yes please!
  
   
It's also fun to pretend you have one when there are multiple opponents sitting below 5 life. They'll do anything for you.
